page.title: 13SHOPPING
page.content: Every Saturday my mum and I go to the {New Strand}for our weekly shopping as there are some large shops there including several supermarkets. We go by car because it is quicker than the bus. It only takes about 10 minutes from our house. Once there we park in a multi-storey car park. For odd things during the week like washing-up liquid, soap or a bag of sugar we use the local shops which are about 400 yards from our house. We also prefer to buy our meat from the local butcher as it seems fresher than the large supermarkets. When we need furniture we go to{MFI} or{Liverpool}town centre. {MFI}is a very large furniture store with many branches throughout the country. We also buy some items from a{catalogue} as payment can be spread over 20 weeks. Sarah Cookson aged 11.
